abstract: London-listed Bear Stearns Private Equity will be renamed JPMorgan Private Equity in an effort to reassure jittery investors, the manager of the $600 million unit told The Financial Times.
snippet: London-listed Bear Stearns Private Equity will be renamed JPMorgan Private Equity in an effort to reassure jittery investors, the manager of the $600 million unit told The Financial Times.
lead_paragraph: One of the more successful remnants of Bear Stearns is about to be renamed after its new owner.

headline.main: Former London-Listed Bear Stearns Fund to Rename Itself
